com.iota.iri.service

Enum Feature

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Feature>
      • com.iota.iri.service.Feature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Feature>

    public enum Feature
extends java.lang.Enum<Feature>
    Features describe the capability of the node. They do not have to have a name specifically linked to a class/action. Features are based on enabled/disabled functionality due to, for example, config values

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DNS_REFRESHER
      This node automatically tries to get the new IP from neighbors with dynamic IPs
      PROOF_OF_WORK
      This node allows doing proof of work for you.
      SNAPSHOT_PRUNING
      This node has enabled snapshot pruning It will most likely just contain "recent" transactions, as defined in the nodes config
      TESTNET
      This node is connected to the testnet instead of the mainnet tangle
      ZMQ
      This node has the zero message queue enabled for fetching/reading "activities" on the node
